long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nano-Influencer helps you find similar influencers using a "look-alike" algorithm, displaying key metrics such as ER(engagement rate) and VR(view rate) for quick screening and targeting. AI automatically extracts public email addresses and other social media accounts (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, etc.), enabling you to find their contact information quickly. With automatic email matching and template filling, you can get the outreach job done 10x faster.
